subject: Thanks, we are accepting your application
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
 
$330,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this elementary form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://tslhqjectrum.com/
